item.title: Key trends in mobile usage from the UK
item.description: Mobile usage in the UK is on the increase. That’s all sounding good so far. The latest communications report from Ofcom has shown a year on year growth of 1.6 million mobiles and the biggest growth in postpaid subscribers due to more customers taking out contracts for smartphones.
